abstract: So many shows! So many shoes! Here are some of the favorites from the cutting-room floor.
snippet: So many shows! So many shoes! Here are some of the favorites from the cutting-room floor.
lead_paragraph: The thing about shoes is that although they fly just under the radar during the Fashion Week frenzy (the clothes, it's true, are very distracting), they are editorial darlings that can become overnight sensations, so much so that often they're the most coveted pieces of a collection by the time they arrive in stores. Which was the idea behind The Daily Shoe, a new Fashion Week feature in which T picked a single shoe from a day of shows, mere hours after its debut. That, and the simple fact that we love shoes. The challenge, of course, was in choosing just the one. There were so many shows! And so many shoes! And so, here are some of the favorites that fell to the cutting-room floor, because at the end of the day there could be only one.
